RFSA Tender Announcement
================================
### Title
Establish Service Arrangements (SAs) to Supply Teaching and Educational Research Services

### Reference
WS3725009809-Doc3725009861

### Publication Date
The tender announcement was published on November 1, 2022.

### Closing Date
The tender submission deadline is 2:00 PM EST on November 1, 2022.

### Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified service providers to submit a bid for the establishment of Service Arrangements (SAs) to Supply Teaching and Educational Research Services.

### Procurement Details

*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Selection Criteria: Variations or combinations of the above methods
*   Contract Type: Request for Supply Arrangement

### Contract Period

*   Expected Contract Start Date: October 31, 2022
*   Expected Contract End Date: October 31, 2023

### Geographical Area

*   Regions of Delivery: Canada

### Trade Agreements

*   The Government of Canada is bound by the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

### Contracting Authority

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   Contact Information: April Charron, Contact Name, april.charron@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria for this RFSA will be based on the following:

*   Demonstrated experience in providing teaching and educational research services to the Government of Canada
*   Service provider's ability to meet the contractual requirements and deliverables
